messages.subject: A sad problem
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/10/03 2:09:26 PM Central Standard Time, AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/10/03 2:09:26 PM Central Standard Time,
AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< but perhaps Keith could indirectly give this guy something to
chew on >>

It sounds like this guy is a conservative Christian...if so, Keiths opinion
will mean zilch to him. It's really sad, but true.

Ren
"The world's much smaller than you think. Made up of two kinds of
people--simple and complicated.....The simple ones are contented. The
complicated ones aren't."

messages.subject: A sad problem
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/10/03 2:09:26 PM Central Standard Time, AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:  Well, if being
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/10/03 2:09:26 PM Central Standard Time,
AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< So I feel like a contributing factor. >>

Well, if being happy is a contributing factor, then it's necessary.
They NEED to know that their are happy families, joyfully learning and living.
And there are times that a divorce is the best thing for the kids.....

Ren
"The world's much smaller than you think. Made up of two kinds of
people--simple and complicated.....The simple ones are contented. The
complicated ones aren't."
